name: Recall.ai
headline: The universal API for meeting video, audio and metadata
description:
Recall is the universal API for meeting bots. We offer a unified API to capture data from meeting platforms like Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet. 

Over 1000 companies rely on our API today to process millions of hours of meeting data. We provide stable infrastructure that typically takes engineering teams 6+ months of time to build, and help our customers get up and running in days instead of months.

# The universal API for meeting bots
Recall.ai provides a single API for meeting bots on every platform like Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Teams and more.
[Get started](https://www.recall.ai/<https:/www.recall.ai/get-started?utm_source=Recall.ai&utm_medium=homepage&utm_content=hero_get_started>)[Book a demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66c1f074e409715f3ecbc7f7_arrow-right.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66fd82560306a4a10eb62504_Arrow%20Blue.svg)](https://www.recall.ai/<https:/www.recall.ai/book-a-demo?utm_source=Recall.ai&utm_medium=homepage&utm_content=hero_book_demo>)

## Access and integrate conversation data into your app
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66b8b0a63e22644cfefde454_Block%20Shadow%20from%20TinyPNG.png)
#### Unified API on all major platforms
With just a few lines of code, integrate your product into Zoom, Google Meet, Microsoft Team, Webex, Slack Huddles and GoTo Meeting.

  * They are on the free plan of a platform

#### Doesn’t require an API to work
Works for all platforms even if there's no official API. All we need is the meeting link. 
![Example of whitelabel meeting bot](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66b8b75dbd1fb049071bbcea_Image%20host.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66b8b0a63e22644cfefde454_Block%20Shadow%20from%20TinyPNG.png)
#### Save thousands of dev hours
Building and operating meeting bots takes a team of 3-5 engineers. We take the load off your plate so you can focus on work that actually matters.
![Examples of meeting data](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66b8b86400c986143abc0e6b_image-api.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/620d732b1f1f7b244ac89f0e/66b8b8b75e78c497a1ab9aac_Texture.svg)

123

generated_description:
Recall.ai is a rising star in the tech ecosystem, founded in 2020 and hailing from the Y Combinator Batch W20. Based in San Francisco with a nimble team of just 20 employees, Recall.ai is on a mission to streamline how companies interact with meeting data via their universal API for all meeting platforms—think Zoom, Microsoft Teams, Google Meet, and more.

What sets Recall.ai apart? They enable over 1,000 companies to efficiently process millions of hours of meeting data, providing a robust infrastructure that typically takes engineering teams six months to develop—only their clients can get it set up in just a matter of days. By offering a unified API for meeting bots, they effectively offload the engineering burden from companies, allowing teams to focus on core product development instead of infrastructure maintenance. 

The platform captures everything from video and audio to metadata, making it easy for developers to gain access to conversation data and integrate it into their applications with just a few lines of code. This isn't just theoretical—companies of all sizes, from nimble startups to large enterprises, rely on Recall.ai to enhance their productivity and streamline workflows.

In terms of security and reliability, Recall.ai doesn't cut corners. They boast compliance with regulations like SOC 2, GDPR, CCPA, and HIPAA, which is especially critical in today's world where data privacy is paramount.

With testimonials from satisfied partners like Instacart and BrightHire, one thing is clear: Recall.ai is not just another API provider; they are redefining how companies can harness the power of their meeting data to drive productivity and collaboratively improve service offerings. 

If you're looking to integrate robust meeting functionalities into your workflow, Recall.ai is definitely worth a look. Explore their offerings through their website, [www.recall.ai](https://www.recall.ai), and see how they can transform your meeting experience into actionable insights.
